courses.title: Complete JavaScript Mastery
courses.description: Master JavaScript from basics to advanced concepts. This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about JavaScript, including ES6+, async programming, and modern best practices.
courses.shortDescription: Master JavaScript from basics to advanced concepts

courses.title: React.js - The Complete Guide
courses.description: Build powerful, fast, user-friendly and reactive web apps with React.js. Includes Redux, React Router, and Next.js.
courses.shortDescription: Build modern web apps with React

courses.title: Python for Data Science
courses.description: Learn Python programming with a focus on data science applications. Cover NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn.

courses.title: Docker & Kubernetes Essentials
courses.description: Master containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes. Learn to deploy scalable applications.

modules.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
modules.description: Learn the basics of JavaScript programming

modules.title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
modules.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript features

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.content: JavaScript is a versatile programming language that runs in browsers and on servers. In this lesson, we'll explore what JavaScript is, its history, and why it's important for modern web development.

lessons.title: Variables and Data Types
lessons.content: Learn about different data types in JavaScript including strings, numbers, booleans, arrays, and objects. We'll also cover variable declaration with let, const, and var.

lessons.title: Functions in JavaScript
lessons.content: Functions are the building blocks of JavaScript applications. Learn how to create functions, pass parameters, and return values.

lessons.title: Closures and Scope
lessons.content: Deep dive into one of JavaScript's most powerful features - closures. Understand scope, lexical environment, and practical applications.

lessons.title: Prototypes and Inheritance
lessons.content: Learn how JavaScript implements object-oriented programming through prototypes and the prototype chain.

lessons.title: Promises Fundamentals
lessons.content: Understand how to work with asynchronous operations using Promises. Learn about resolve, reject, then, and catch.

lessons.title: Async/Await Pattern
lessons.content: Learn the modern way to handle asynchronous operations in JavaScript using async/await syntax.

lessons.title: Introduction to React
lessons.content: Learn what React is, why it's popular, and how to set up your first React application.

lessons.title: JSX and Components
lessons.content: Understand JSX syntax and learn how to create functional and class components in React.

lessons.title: useState Hook
lessons.content: Learn how to manage component state using the useState hook in React.

liveStreams.title: JavaScript Q&A Session
liveStreams.description: Live Q&A session about JavaScript fundamentals and advanced concepts. Bring your questions!

liveStreams.title: React Best Practices Workshop
liveStreams.description: Interactive workshop on React best practices, performance optimization, and common pitfalls to avoid.

liveStreams.title: Data Science Office Hours
liveStreams.description: Weekly office hours for data science students. Get help with your projects and assignments.
